title: R-Studio 7.0 Build 154109 Network Edition (2013)
description:
R-Studio 7.0 Build 154109 Network Edition (2013)

R-Studio 7.0 Build 154109 Network Edition + Portable
Operating system : Windows Ã‚Â® XP | Vista | 7 & 8
Year: 2013
Language : English, Spanish, German, Russian, French
Medicine: Complete / Sew
Size : 32.37 Mb / 25.56 Mb

R-Studio - data recovery software . Supported file system software for data recovery in case of their removal, removal or damage to partitions , as well as in cases where the drive was formatted or, for example, there was a virus attack . The file system supports FAT12/16/32, NTFS, NTFS5, Ext2FS (Linux), HFS / HFS + (Macintosh), UFS1/UFS2 (FreeBSD / OpenBSD / NetBSD / Solaris), HFS and HFS +. Restore data using R-Studio can not only on the local computer and on hard drives of other computers on the local network. One of the features of R-Studio is flexible adjustment of its parameters, which allows you absolute control over data recovery .

R-Studio utilities recover files:
- Deleted without Recycle Bin, or when Recycle Bin has been emptied
- Removed by virus attack or power failure
- After the partition with the files was reformatted, even for different file system
- When the partition structure on a hard disk was changed or damaged
- The hard disk on which a large number of bad sectors

Features:
- Standard Interface "Windows Explorer"
- Recovering data over a network
- Supported file systems : FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS, NTFS5, HFS / HFS +, Little and Big Endian variants of UFS1/UFS2 and Ext2FS/Ext3FS
- Recognition and parsing Dynamic , Basic and BSD (UNIX) partitions layout schema and Apple partition
- Support for dynamic partitions on GPT, as well as MBR
- Reconstruction of damaged disk arrays (RAID)
- Creates IMAGE FILES for an entire Hard Disk (HD), section or part
- Data recovery on damaged or deleted partitions , encrypted files (NTFS5), alternative data streams (NTFS, NTFS5)
- Recovering data if FDISK or other disk utilities
- Recovering data after a virus attack, damaged FAT; MBR destruction
- Recognizes localized names
- Recovered files can be saved on any network including disks accessible by the host operating system
- File or disk content can be viewed and edited with the advanced hexadecimal editor

New features:
- Different ways of reporting
- Organise files
- Expandable Known File Types
- Support for mass file recovery
- Common Find / Mark
- Advanced Hex Editor
- Support for new file systems
- Support for Apple Computers
- Support for Big Indian variant UFS
- Support for GPT partition scheme
- Support for APM
- Support for various unusual RAID configurations
- R-Studio Technical Portable added to the package R-Studio Technical
- Compressed image format support

Features RePacK- version :
Type : installation , unpacking portable (by Punsh)
Languages: multi, there are Russian
Treatment: held (patch-0x001gff)
Cut: Help , the module auto-update
Bit: automatic detection x86/x64
Extras : Pick-up settings from a file Settings.reg
